content: @Grahame Grieve, the publisher is failing expanding a very simple value set - all descendants of a code within an IG-defined code system. As a result, I'm also getting a bunch of other validation errors. You can see the reported error here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pcde/qa#_scratch_ig-build-temp-69FHJN_repo_input_vocabulary_valueset-PCDESectionCode
that's pretty confusing because there's no way it can
well, now that I've fixed the bug that meant I vouldn't build it (it cannot be building on the ci build, so there's some other bug there), of course it doesn't understand that filter
Well, it's doing the impossible then, because it did build - you can see the timestamp :)
Is the filter invalid or is it indeed a bug?
there's several bugs there but the filter itself is invalid - it refers to a non-existent code
